name: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
description: Premium wireless headphones with noise cancellation and 30-hour battery life. Perfect for music lovers and professionals.

name: Smart Fitness Watch
description: Advanced fitness tracking with heart rate monitoring, GPS, and smartphone notifications. Water resistant up to 50m.

name: Designer Cotton T-Shirt
description: Premium quality cotton t-shirt with modern fit. Available in multiple colors and sizes. Machine washable.

name: Leather Crossbody Bag
description: Genuine leather crossbody bag with adjustable strap. Perfect for everyday use with multiple compartments.

name: Modern Table Lamp
description: Stylish table lamp with LED bulb included. Perfect for bedside or office desk. Touch-sensitive dimmer.

name: Smartphone with 128GB Storage
description: Latest smartphone with advanced camera system, 128GB storage, and all-day battery life.

name: Casual Denim Jeans
description: Comfortable denim jeans with stretch fabric. Classic fit suitable for casual and semi-formal occasions.

name: Indoor Plant Pot Set
description: Set of 3 ceramic plant pots with drainage holes. Perfect for herbs, succulents, and small plants.

name: Wireless Earbuds
description: Compact wireless earbuds with high-quality sound and touch controls. Includes charging case.

name: Stylish Sunglasses
description: UV-protected stylish sunglasses with polarized lenses. Perfect for summer outings.
